data.title: The Palace of Auburn Hills Map Art by City Prints
data.meta_description: Map art print including the aerial view of The Palace of Auburn Hills located in Auburn Hills, Michigan.
data.text:
Pro basketball arena City Prints bring you court side for the electrifying atmosphere just before tip-off. City Prints look like modern art and remind you of the unforgettable moments you experienced in your favorite seats – they are truly the perfect personalized gift.

Finishing Options

UNFRAMED EAch print is printed on high-quality 105# Stardream Pearlescent Paper. This heavy paper stock has a subtle metallic shimmer that gives your print a unique visual effect. The back also has a SKU number on the top right to help with orienting your print for hanging!

WOOD FRAME & MATTE The size of this frame will vary depending on the size of the map you created. Frames are 23″ x 23″ for 12″ x 12″ prints and frames are 15.75″ x 19.75″ for 12″ x 16″ maps. Both frames have a black 1.75” wide genuine-wood molding. The print is enhanced with a soft white acid-free mat, which is bevel cut and placed on top of the print. The print and matt are protected by a premium crystal-clear acrylic overlay. The back of the frame is sealed with a dust cover for added protection. Industrial silver hanging hardware is bolted to the back of the frame – it’s ready to hang on your wall.

POLY FRAME The size of this frame will vary depending on the size of the map you created. Frames are 16.5″ x 16.5″ for 12″ x 12″ prints and frames are 16.5″ x 20.5″ for 12″ x 16″ maps. Our frames have a black 2.75” wide heavy polystyrene molding. We choose to mount the prints without an acrylic overlay, which shows off the unique properties of our paper stock when it hits the light. The back of the frame is sealed with a dust cover for added protection. Industrial silver hanging hardware is bolted to the back of the frame – it’s ready to hang on your wall.

GALLERY WRAPPED CANVAS The size of canvases will vary depending on the size of the map you created. Canvas are 30″ x 30″ for 12″ x 12″ prints and canvases are 30″ x 40″ for 12″ x 16″ maps. We print directly on high-quality canvas, then stretch the image over heavy gauge 1.5″ deep wood stretcher bars. Corners are braced with additional bars and heavy hardware is attached to the back so your piece is ready to hang.

Publisher

City Prints

Language

English

Published

2018

Map Scale

No Scale
